name: communityrequests_entities
comment: Holds data about individual wishlist wishes and focus areas

columns.name: cr_page
columns.comment: Foreign key to page_id and primary key for the communityrequests_entities table

columns.name: cr_entity_type
columns.comment: The ID of the type of the entity. 0 for wish, 1 for focus area

columns.name: cr_status
columns.comment: The ID of the status of the entity, configured in $wgCommunityRequestsStatuses

columns.name: cr_wish_type
columns.comment: The ID of the type of the wish, configured in $wgCommunityRequestsWishTypes

columns.name: cr_focus_area
columns.comment: The focus area page ID that the wish belongs to

columns.name: cr_actor
columns.comment: Actor ID of the author of the entity

columns.name: cr_vote_count
columns.comment: Number of votes for the entity

columns.name: cr_base_lang
columns.comment: The base language of the entity from which translations are made

columns.name: cr_created
columns.comment: Timestamp of the creation of the entity

columns.name: cr_updated
columns.comment: Timestamp of the last update of the entity

indexes.name: cr_created
indexes.comment: Index for sorting wishes by creation timestamp

indexes.name: cr_updated
indexes.comment: Index for sorting wishes by last updated timestamp

indexes.name: cr_vote_count
indexes.comment: Index for sorting wishes by vote count

name: communityrequests_translations
comment: Holds translations of translatable fields of individual wishes and focus areas

indexes.name: crt_lang_title
indexes.comment: Index for filtering by language and title

name: communityrequests_tags
comment: Tag IDs associated with wishlist entities

columns.name: crtg_tag
columns.comment: ID of the tag as configured in $wgCommunityRequestsTags

columns.name: crc_value
columns.comment: The current value of the counter

columns.name: crc_type
columns.comment: ID of the type (wish or focus area)
